info.subtitle: Boat Core — Core Lib of Boat

section.title: Introduction
section.simpara: Boat core provides core interfaces, functions and utilities for Boat, including:

listitem.simpara: : Base package, a serials of core and base interfaces and components;
: Bean package, supports fast and convenient operation for bean;
: Convert package, supports various types conversion each other;
: Cache package, provides core cache interfaces and built-in implementations;
: Package about run and thread, provides Runner interfaces and implementations;
: Bus package, provides EventBus interfaces;
: Provides Invoker interfaces and implementations;
: Provides ProxyClass to proxy a class in runtime dynamically, by reflection, spring-core or cglib ways;
: Provides State interfaces represents a state or status;
: About exceptions;
: Collection extension package, supports chain operation, multi-value-map, various utilities, etc.;
: Reflection extension package, provides many convenient reflection operation;
: Input/Output interfaces and utilities package;
: Provides JVM underlying operations;
: Other convenient tools;
: Provides interfaces and utilities for testing;

section.title: Lang
section.simpara: Lang package provides a serials of core and base interfaces and components:

listitem.simpara: Global system objects: Current, Defaults, Environment;
Lang syntax enhancement (mainly for Java): Let, Ref, Lazy, LazyString;
String/CharSequence functions: CharsFormat, CharsTemplate, NamingCase;
Special character support: CtlChars, EscChars, CsiChars, SgrChars;
Accessor interfaces: SingleAccessor, MapAccessor, GenericSingleAccessor, GenericMapAccessor;
Helper interfaces and utilities: SpecParser, CachingProductBuilder, Processing;
Common utilities: Anys, Bools, Chars, Nums, Dates, Randoms, RandomSupplier, Compares, Checks, Requires, Enums, Loaders.

section.title: Bean
section.simpara: Bean package supports fast and convenient operation for bean:

listitem.simpara: Beans: Default utilities for bean operation;
BeanResolver: Core Interface to resolve bean, Beans use its default implementation;
BeanResolveHandler: Handler to process resolving for BeanResolver;
BeanMap: A type of Map implementation that associated with a bean, means make a bean as a Map;
BeanType: To describe struct of a type of bean like Class;
PropertyType: To describe a property of bean like Field;

tip.simpara: Beans is more than 20 times faster than Apache BeanUtils in copy-properties function.

section.title: Convert
section.simpara: Convert package supports various types conversion each other:

listitem.simpara: Converts: Default utilities for type conversion operation;
Converter: Core interfaces for type conversion, Converts use its default implementation;
ConvertHandler: Handler to process converting for Converter;
FastConverter: A fast type converter which must specify the target type;

section.title: Cache
section.simpara: Cache package provides core cache interfaces and built-in implementations:

listitem.simpara: Cache: Core Cache interface;
FastCache: Implementation by WeakHashMap and ThreadLocal;
CaffeineCache: Implementation by Caffeine;
GuavaCache: Implementation by Guava;
MapCache: Implementation by Map, means make Map as Cache;

section.title: Run
section.simpara: Run package is about run and thread, provides Runner interfaces and implementations:

listitem.simpara: Runner: Core interface to run threads;
Running: Core interface represents a running thread;
Scheduler: Core interface to schedule tasks;
Scheduling: Core interface represents a scheduling task;
EventBus: Event bus interface and implementations;

section.title: Invoke
section.simpara: Invoke package Provides Invoker interfaces and implementations:

listitem.simpara: Invoker: Core invoke interface;

section.title: Proxy
section.simpara: Proxy package provides ProxyClass to proxy a class in runtime dynamically, by reflection, spring-core or cglib ways:

listitem.simpara: ProxyClass: Core interface to proxy target Class;
ProxyMethod: Core interface represents proxy method body;
ProxyClassFactory: Factory to create ProxyClass, built-in Reflection, spring-core and cglib implementation;

section.title: State
section.simpara: State package provides State interfaces represents a state or status:

listitem.simpara: State: Core interface represents a state or status;
StringState: State for String type;

section.title: Exception
section.simpara: Exception package provides Exception implementation and utilities:

listitem.simpara: ExceptionStatus: Interface extends , used for Exception;
StatusException: Exception implements ExceptionStatus;
ImpossibleException: The exception represents an impossible thrown case but actually thrown;

section.title: Collect
section.simpara: Collect package extends collection function, supports chain operation, multi-value-map, various utilities, etc.:

listitem.simpara: Collects: Default utilities for Collection;
Collecting, Mapping: Collection interfaces provide chain operation and integrates common collection interface functions (such as Iterable, Collection, Set, List);
IterableType, MapType: Meta type interfaces for generic Collection types;
MultiMaps: MultiMaps provides multi-values Map such as SetMap, MutableSetMap, ListMap and MutableListMap;
CopyOnWriteMap: Map for copy-on-write operation;

section.title: Reflect
section.simpara: Reflect package extends reflection function, provides many convenient reflection operation:

listitem.simpara: Reflects: Provides reflect operations;
Types: To build generic types;
TypeRef: Help to code a type reference;

section.title: IO
section.simpara: IO package provides Input/Output interfaces and utilities package:

listitem.simpara: IOStreams: Provides operations for Input/Output, Reader/Writer;
Jvms: Provides JVM underlying operations;

section.title: Utils
section.simpara: Utils package provides Other convenient tools:

listitem.simpara: Counter: Simple counter for int/long, may atomic;
About: Product info such as About, Author, SemVer;

section.title: Test
section.simpara: Test package provides interfaces and utilities for testing:

listitem.simpara: Tester: Core interface to run test tasks;
TestTask, TestListener: Cor interface of test task and listener;
TestLogger: Simple logger for testing;
Tests: Default utilities for testing;
